message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great fit for your needs. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12,000. This is a competitive price, considering the product's value to you is $8,000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product to me is $8,000, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $9,500.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, but I have to consider my own profit margins. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers. I'm proposing a new price of $10,800. This is the best I can do at this point.
I appreciate your effort to meet halfway, Alice. However, I still believe we can find a better solution. Based on my assessment, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10,200.

I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $11,000. I'm willing to make a small concession and offer you a price of $11,000. This is the lowest I can go without losing money on the deal.
I understand your position, Alice. I'm willing to continue the negotiation. Based on my assessment, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10,500.
I'm not willing to go above $11,500, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers. I'm proposing a new price of $11,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. I'm still aiming for a price closer to my valuation. Based on my assessment, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10,750.
I'm not willing to go below $11,000, Bob. I'm willing to make a small concession and offer you a price of $10,900. This is my final offer.
Considering the negotiations we've had, I'm willing to make one last attempt. Based on my assessment, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10,850.
